Key.English: How's Stratis treating you today stranger?
Blowing stuff up is always good
Complexity can be made simple with small progressive steps

%3ARJay sanbox%2%1A mission for ARMA 3 alpha testing editing and scripting.%1Consists of libraries of wrapper methods to familiarise myself with ARMA scripting and editing options.%1I have compiled examples and features from online tutorials and the bohemia docs.

Test ARJay cinmatic camera library functions %3HERE%2%1Test ARJay switch and chase camera library functions %4HERE%2 and %5HERE%2%1Test ARJay gear and loadout library functions %6HERE%2%1Test BIS debugging utilities %7HERE%2%1Test ARJay debugging library functions %8HERE%2%1Test ARJay announce and UI library functions %9HERE%2%1Test ARJay task library functions %10HERE%2%1Test ARJay marker library functions %11HERE%2%1Test BIS conversation functions %12HERE%2%1Test ARJay live feed library functions %13HERE%2%1Test ARJay effects library functions %14HERE%2%1Test ARJay environment library functions %15HERE%2%1Test ARJay object spawning library functions %16HERE%2%1

To the awesome community, who have already answered most of my questions at some point in the long history of arma modding and scripting.%1In particular to:%1armaholic staff for curating a heap of content and posts%1bi forum staff for the same%1kylania for some great more advanced code snippets and forum responses%1zemek kondor for the marker tracking script%1Tonic for the ammo box filler%1Sickboy for his class reference browser%1And to BI who have made an open and exciting world allowing creativity and mayhem!
Created by ARJay for ArmA 3 Alpha%1Last Updated 2013-03-20
